text: The Men's 200 metre breaststroke competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 13 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|Ippei Watanabe||align=left|||align=left|2:06.67||Tokyo||29 January 2017 |- |African record||align=left|Neil Versfeld||align=left|||align=left|2:09.61||Rome||30 July 2009 |- |Championship record||align=left|William Diering||align=left|||align=left|2:15.65||Casablanca||16 September 2010 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
